title: Charles Best, Founder Of DonorsChoose
teaser: Host Jessica Harris talks with Charles Best, founder of DonorsChoose, an online philanthropic marketplace. Harris also talks with Jon Oringer, founder of Shutterstock.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris talks with Charles Best, founder of DonorsChoose, an online philanthropic marketplace. Harris also talks with Jon Oringer, founder of Shutterstock.
